statements: SELECT * FROM email_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_type, start_date FROM email_campaigns WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, target_audience, budget FROM email_campaigns WHERE campaign_type = 'newsletter' ORDER BY target_audience ASC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, end_date FROM email_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT campaign_name, status FROM email_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC, end_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM email_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY campaign_name ASC
SELECT campaign_name, target_audience FROM email_campaigns WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY campaign_name DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, campaign_type, target_audience FROM email_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM email_campaigns WHERE status = 'completed' ORDER BY budget DESC, campaign_name ASC LIMIT 4
SELECT * FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM Customers WHERE purchase_total > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email_address, purchase_total FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_total FROM Customers WHERE email_address LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT customer_name, purchase_total FROM Customers WHERE purchase_total BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM Customers WHERE purchase_total > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date FROM Customers INNER JOIN PurchaseHistory ON Customers.customer_id = PurchaseHistory.customer_id;
SELECT AVG(purchase_total) AS avg_purchase_total, MAX(purchase_total) AS max_purchase_total FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount, purchased_items FROM Customers LEFT JOIN PurchaseHistory ON Customers.customer_id = PurchaseHistory.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, target_segment FROM email_campaigns WHERE target_segment = 'VIP';
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN products ON customers.customer_id = products.product_id;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 100;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, purchase_history FROM customers WHERE purchase_history @> '{"product": "Shoes"}';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT campaign_name, target_segment FROM email_campaigns WHERE target_segment = 'High-Value Customers';
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE status = 'active' AND start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM Customers JOIN Purchases ON Customers.customer_id = Purchases.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com' AND customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_orders > 5;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE email_address LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, purchase_history FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_orders > 5;
SELECT c.campaign_name, cr.response_type, cr.response_date FROM campaigns c JOIN campaign_responses cr ON c.campaign_id = cr.campaign_id WHERE cr.response_type = 'click';
